attributes.action: Find the time to look at file full of proof, for the truth and justice for innocent children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all wish to see a full and frank investigation into what is not just claims of lies and injustice but can be backed up with documented records of accounts and original reports and letter's and diary inputs also witness statements form many professionals and various other valid personals.

rejection.details: The meaning of your petition is unclear. Please reword and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
